text: Mandy Minella was the defending champion, however she chose not to participate due to a right arm edema. Edina Gallovits-Hall won the title, defeating Petra Martić in the final, 6–2, 6–2. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == * Main draw South Seas Island Resort Women's Pro Classic - Singles
title: 2014 South Seas Island Resort Women's Pro Classic – Singles
